mapper.sql: s.id,s.sxf, s.scanID, s.salary, s.status, s.days, s.createBy, s.createTime, s.updateBy, s.updateTime, s.version, s.isDeleted,s.isRush,s.isManualAdd

where 1=1 and s.id = #{condition.id} and s.scanID = #{condition.scanID} and s.salary = #{condition.salary} and s.status = #{condition.status} and s.days = #{condition.days} and s.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and s.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and s.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and s.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and s.version = #{condition.version} and s.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and s.isManualAdd = #{condition.isManualAdd}

where 1=1 and s.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(s.scanID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.scanID}),'%')) and UPPER(s.salary) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.salary}),'%')) and UPPER(s.status) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.status}),'%')) and UPPER(s.days) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.days}),'%')) and UPPER(s.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(s.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(s.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(s.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(s.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(s.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(s.isManualAdd) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isManualAdd}),'%'))
mapper.update: update scansettlemember set scanID=#{scanID}, salary=#{salary}, status=#{status}, days=#{days}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, isRush=#{isRush}, sxf=#{sxf}, isManualAdd=#{isManualAdd}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from scansettlemember s where s.id = #{id} and s.isDeleted = false

SELECT ss.`title`, s.`id` , su.`phoneNumber`, s.isRush, ss.createBy, s.version, s.createTime FROM scansettlemember s LEFT JOIN scansettle ss ON ss.`id` = s.`scanID` LEFT JOIN shiro_user su ON ss.`createBy` = su.`id` WHERE s.createBy = #{condition.id} AND (s.status = 0 or s.status = -1) AND ss.`status` = 0 AND ss.isDeleted = false order by s.createTime DESC

SELECT count(1) FROM scansettlemember s LEFT JOIN scansettle ss ON ss.`id` = s.`scanID` LEFT JOIN shiro_user su ON ss.`createBy` = su.`id` WHERE s.createBy = #{condition.id} AND s.status = 0 AND ss.`status` = 0 AND ss.isDeleted = false
SELECT count(1) FROM scansettlemember s LEFT JOIN scansettle ss ON ss.`id` = s.`scanID` LEFT JOIN shiro_user su ON ss.`createBy` = su.`id` WHERE s.createBy = #{condition.id} AND s.status = 1

SELECT ss.`title`, s.`salary`, s.`updateTime` FROM scansettlemember s LEFT JOIN scansettle ss ON ss.`id` = s.`scanID` LEFT JOIN shiro_user su ON ss.`createBy` = su.`id` WHERE s.createBy = #{condition.id} AND s.status = 1 ORDER BY s.`updateTime` DESC
mapper.update: update scansettlemember set status=0 where scanID = #{scanID} AND status=-1
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(su.realName,salaryImport.realName) as 'realName' , IFNULL(su.`phoneNumber`,salaryImport.personPhoneNumber) as 'phoneNumber', DATE(scansettlemember.`createTime`) AS 'time', scansettlemember.`salary`, scansettlemember.id, IFNULL(personalauthen.`personIDCard`,salaryImport.personIDCard) as 'personIDCard', (CASE scansettlemember.`status` WHEN '0' THEN '待结算' WHEN '1' THEN '已结算' WHEN '2' THEN '已拒绝' ELSE '待支付' END) as 'status' FROM scansettlemember scansettlemember LEFT JOIN shiro_user su ON su.id = scansettlemember.`createBy` LEFT JOIN personalauthen personalauthen ON personalauthen.`userID` = su.id left join salaryImport salaryImport on salaryImport.scanID = scansettlemember.id WHERE scansettlemember.`scanID` = #{scanID} AND scansettlemember.`isDeleted` = FALSE

SELECT * FROM (SELECT s.`createTime`, s.status, su.id, IFNULL(su.`realName`, su.`nickName`) AS 'name', p.`personPhoneNumber` as 'phoneNumber', (select id from scansettlemember scansettlemember where scansettlemember.createBy = s.createBy and scansettlemember.scanID = #{condition.scanID}) as 'isCheck' FROM scansettlemember s LEFT JOIN shiro_user su ON su.`id` = s.`createBy` LEFT JOIN personalauthen p ON p.`userID` = su.`id` WHERE s.`createTime` > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND s.status = 1 AND s.`scanID` IN (SELECT id FROM scansettle scan WHERE scan.createBy = #{condition.userID}) ORDER BY s.`createTime` DESC) s GROUP BY s.`id` ORDER BY s.createTime DESC
DELETE FROM scansettlemember WHERE scansettlemember.scanID = #{scanID} AND scansettlemember.status != 1 AND scansettlemember.isManualAdd = true
